Class Restaurant

java.lang.Object
Restaurant
public class Restaurant extends Object
Represents a Restaurant

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Restaurant()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    addReservation()
    Takes customer details and adds a new reservation (if table is available at requested time) Also calls cleanReservation() - to remove any reservations that might be occupying a table
    static void
    cancelReservation()
    Takes customer's contact number or name from I/O to manually cancel the reservation
    static void
    cleanReservation()
    Goes through all reservations and cancels those in which XX mins from time has passed and customer hasn't arrived XX mins is decided by variable delayTime in the Reservation class
    static int
    findReservation​(long num)
     
    static int
    findReservation​(String name)
     
    static void
    loadRestDetails()
    Loads the Restaurant Details from a text file
    static void
    printbill()
    Takes Table No (from I/O) and prints bill Also deletes the corresponding order from the orders ArrayList Also cancels the corresponding reservation (and frees up the table)
    static void
    printReservations()
    Prints all reservations for staff to see
    static void
    saveRestDetails()
    Saves the Restaurant Details in a text file
    static void
    serviceReservation()
    Takes customer's mobile number (from I/O) to find reservation and notes that the customer has arrived (This is to prevent reservation from expiring and then being deleted by cleanReservation() when customer is seated) reservation will not be serviced is customer is too early (such that there is no conflict with another customer who reserved earlier)
    static void
    takeOrder()
    Takes table no and employee ID (from I/O) and then takes order using indexes of items in the Menu.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public Restaurant()

  • Method Details

    • saveRestDetails

      public static void saveRestDetails()
      Saves the Restaurant Details in a text file

    • loadRestDetails

      public static void loadRestDetails()
      Loads the Restaurant Details from a text file

    • cleanReservation

      public static void cleanReservation()
      Goes through all reservations and cancels those in which XX mins from time has passed and customer hasn't arrived XX mins is decided by variable delayTime in the Reservation class

    • addReservation

      public static void addReservation()
      Takes customer details and adds a new reservation (if table is available at requested time) Also calls cleanReservation() - to remove any reservations that might be occupying a table

    • findReservation

      public static int findReservation​(long num)
      Parameters:
      num - Mobile Number of customer
      Returns:
      index of reservation in reservation array if found (-1 if reservation not found)

    • findReservation

      public static int findReservation​(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - Name of customer
      Returns:
      int index of reservation in reservation array if found (-1 if reservation not found)

    • serviceReservation

      public static void serviceReservation()
      Takes customer's mobile number (from I/O) to find reservation and notes that the customer has arrived (This is to prevent reservation from expiring and then being deleted by cleanReservation() when customer is seated) reservation will not be serviced is customer is too early (such that there is no conflict with another customer who reserved earlier)

    • cancelReservation

      public static void cancelReservation()
      Takes customer's contact number or name from I/O to manually cancel the reservation

    • printReservations

      public static void printReservations()
      Prints all reservations for staff to see

    • takeOrder

      public static void takeOrder()
      Takes table no and employee ID (from I/O) and then takes order using indexes of items in the Menu. This is then stored in the ArrayList orders

    • printbill

      public static void printbill()
      Takes Table No (from I/O) and prints bill Also deletes the corresponding order from the orders ArrayList Also cancels the corresponding reservation (and frees up the table)
